import*as GA from"./ga";/**
 * A direction is stored as an array `[0, 0, 0, 0, y, x, 0, 0]` representing
 * vector `(x, y)`.
 */export var from=function from(point){return[0,0,0,0,point[4],point[5],0,0];};export var fromTo=function fromTo(from,to){return GA.inormalized([0,0,0,0,to[4]-from[4],to[5]-from[5],0,0]);};export var orthogonal=function orthogonal(direction){return GA.inormalized([0,0,0,0,-direction[5],direction[4],0,0]);};export var orthogonalToLine=function orthogonalToLine(line){return GA.mul(line,GA.I);};
